txt.en: Deep-claws and cave-claws infest the Mines of Moria in overwhelming numbers, harrying efforts to reinstate the great dwarf-realm that once was. A great service will be done for the dwarves should the presence of the vermin be lessened in the mines.

Travellers would do well to mind the ever-growing presence of deep-claws in Moria. The beasts are not intelligent, to be sure, but they will ravage anyone that they perceive as threats, emerging from the shadows to rip and slaver with their sharp teeth and talons.
